metadata.Title: CVE-2019-16884 on Ubuntu 18.04 LTS (bionic) - medium
metadata.Description:
runc through 1.0.0-rc8, as used in Docker through 19.03.2-ce and otherproducts, allows AppArmor restriction bypass becauselibcontainer/rootfs_linux.go incorrectly checks mount targets, and thus amalicious Docker image can mount over a /proc directory.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2019-16884` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

runc - 1.0.0~rc10-0ubuntu1~18.04.2
No subscription required

criterions.comment: runc package in bionic was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '1.0.0~rc10-0ubuntu1~18.04.2').
